thag15.2:7.1: Mindfulness is his neck, his head is wisdom—
thag15.2:7.3: His belly is the sacred hearth of the Dhamma,
thag15.2:8.3: The giant is serene when walking,

thag15.2:9.1: the giant is serene when lying down,
thag15.2:9.2: and when sitting, the giant is serene.

thag15.2:13.1: Just so the Buddha is born in the world,
thag15.2:13.3: but the world doesn’t stick to him,
thag15.2:13.4: as water does not stick to the lotus.
